thread.section_title: Misty Waves Boutique Hotel Hermanus - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming hotel with spectacular view
thread.title_full: Charming hotel with spectacular view - Review of Misty Waves Boutique Hotel Hermanus, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: LondonerNW3
title: Charming hotel with spectacular view
text: This boutique hotel is a great find, with beautiful furniture, wonderful staff and very comfortable rooms, the location is excellent, with a very easy five minute walk into the centre of town, yet on the sea (albeit across a road). Breakfast was disappointing, but more than adequate. Would certainly recommend to anyone wanting a five star guest house with very very reasonable prices. The staff were spectacular.
